p: Formation of biofilm by MRSA strain was optimized at different time intervals, a complete biofilm formation was observed at 48 h. Subsequently, inhibitory studies were performed by treating these extracts with the culture. Among these 8 extracts (4 plants extracted with 2 solvents), pet. ether extract of A. indica and ethanolic extract of P. guajava showed better antimicrobial and anti-biofilm activity compared to the other extracts.
